text: læa brrdā p̄hū̂ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā dị̂ kl̀āw kæ̀ brrdā r̀x sūl k̄hxng phwk k̄heā ẁā “næ̀nxn reā ca k̄hạb phwk th̀ān xxk cāk p̄hæ̀ndin k̄hxng reā h̄rụ̄x ẁā phwk th̀ān ca klạb pị yạng ṣ̄ās̄nā k̄hxng reā” dạngnận phracêā k̄hxng phwk k̄heā thrng wa ḥī h̄ı̂ kæ̀ phwk k̄heā (brrdā r̀x sūl) ẁā “næ̀nxn reā ca thảlāy phwk xṭhrrm”
